title: So why exactly has Vayne not been nerfed yet?
body:
Mobility, free MS, true damage max hp, a better Poppy E, invisibility, urf mode Q during ultimate. 

Why exactly has Vayne not been nerfed yet? In my opinion, Vayne is 3x more broken than Kai’sa is. At least Kai’sa has no CC and needs items for stealth, meanwhile balanced champ Vayne gets this for free at level 6. At least Kai’sa passive deals magic damage instead of true damage.

replies.body: Vayne has CC, Kai'Sa has poke. Kai'Sa needs items for stealth, Vayne needs to ult for stealth. Vayne's steroid focuses on tanks, Kai'Sa's steroids are split between tanks and other targets.
Because she doesn’t need nerfs. -.- the guinsuu changes already killed the champion.
Because she's going to always have those things. That's why listing a kit and saying they need nerfs because of their kit is absolute nonsense.

the argument for vayne is that she has incredibly short aa's and she's proned to get outranged by other adc's but the issue with vayne is once you hit the 20 minute mark she'll just shit on anyone regardless

i've got a bias hatred for vayne since she counters literally every single one of the champions i play so i'm the wrong person to be giving my perspective about her but ya i'd say nerf into the ground but riot's hellbent on buffing her judged by patch history
because lcs "outplays" of her tumbling one skill shot and autoing a team down.
